attributes.action: Vote for natural herd immunity to take place with support for the vulnerable.
attributes.additional_details:
For the government to let the people vote to choose whether they want natural herd immunty to take place rather than lockdowns. 
With this vote the high risk would have the choice to lock themselves down for this grants etc need to be put into place for these people, but it needs to be a choice and not enforced.
attributes.background: To put it to the people through a vote to stop lockdowns and to go ahead and let the population get natural herd immunity. With this being said steps need to be put into place to keep those who are high risk safe i.e grants available to them so they can isolate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
